name: Leavitt Partners
tagline: Healthcare policy consulting—navigating value-based care and federal regulations
description: Leavitt Partners helps clients successfully improve health by advancing value. The firm provides services focused on market and industry influences, value-based care, alternative payment models, federal strategies, public health, digital health, and alliances.
known_for: Founded by former HHS Secretary and Utah Governor Mike Leavitt, the firm specializes in healthcare policy intelligence and value-based care transformation. Known for deep federal policy connections and helping healthcare stakeholders navigate regulatory complexity.
career_path: Analyst/Fellow (2-3 yrs) → Associate (2-3 yrs) → Consultant (3-4 yrs) → Director (4+ yrs)

recruiting.process: Application (resume, cover letter, writing sample) → Phone Screen (30 min) → Panel Interview (video/in-person with 3 employees) → Written Case Study (1 hour timed analysis)
recruiting.unique: Written case study is timed (1 hour) with 3 different prompts to choose from, with candidates responding to one prompt with a one-page written analysis. Strong focus on healthcare policy knowledge and writing ability.
recruiting.timeline: Typically recruits from top universities with strong healthcare administration, economics, and public policy programs. Rolling applications.

byu.tip: Founded by Utah Governor Mike Leavitt—Utah roots may help. Focus on healthcare policy knowledge and strong writing samples. Salt Lake City office may be more accessible than DC.
